Iteration.Iteration_message: One or more U or O characters replaced by X for alignment score calculations at positions 1, 3, 24, 27, 36, 55, 62, 66, 78, 80, 84, 97, 107, 122, 125, 137, 152, 157, 158, 172,... (only first 20 shown)
